Description: Stamp (vessel): half-qisṭ. Measure of olive-oil. With five line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: See also OA+ 4017. Cf. Viré, F. 1956. Dénéraux, estampilles et poids musulmans en verre en Tunisie (Collection H.H. Abdul Wahhab). ‘Cahiers de Tunisie’ IV, 6.
ʿUbaydāllāh's half-qisṭ for olive oil is scarce compared with the qisṭ and quarter-qisṭ, as seems to be the case for other officials as well. See also OA+ 4017.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (59)
